text: Mu ngeri yeemu abantu twabagezesa nga tukozesa bannaabwe (abamu netubafuula abagagga abalala baavu, abamu) nebatuuka okugamba nti abo mu ffe fenna Katonda beyasalawo okugonnomolako e kyengera (e kyobukkiriza), (naye okutuuka okwogera e kyo tebamanyi nti) bulijjo Katonda amanyi nnyo e bikwata ku baddu abeebaza
